Breadth-First.Explanation: Initial broad description and clue collection without a specific hypothesis
Exploring multiple possible streets and tram lines, generating hypotheses
Diverging to search for store location, gathering varied clues
Comparative exploration of several candidate areas around Oslo center
Shifting focus to distinctive signage, gathering new clues broadly

Depth-First.Explanation: Focused analysis on a specific street hypothesis
Verifying and narrowing to a precise intersection and neighborhood
Confirming the Frogner neighborhood using specific local characteristics
Converging multiple corroborating clues to finalize location
Providing the precise, final location conclusion

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Moved from broad exploration of possible streets to focused verification of a specific street hypothesis
Abandoned the specific street verification and returned to broad clue collection by searching store location
Switched from divergent signage exploration back to focused verification of a single intersection and neighborhood
